Title: Real Life Is the Nightmare
Writer: Jonathan Tropper (created by), David Schickler (created by), Justin Britt-Gibson
Actors: Antony Starr, Ivana Milicevic, Ulrich Thomsen, Frankie Faison
Plot: Carrie quits her job at the diner. Deva steals from a video game store. After Siobhan's discovery, Lucas decides to kill Proctor before leaving Banshee for good, with unforeseen consequences.
